div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Allergen No Drug
Import all the codes that are contained in Léčivé přípravky
Import all the codes that are contained in Český číselník ATC skupin
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Absent Or Unknown Allergy
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Exceptional Value

title.value: eHDSI Agent or Allergen With Exceptions

description.value: The Value Set is used for coding s specific allergen or other agent/substance (drug, food, chemical agent, etc.) to which the patient has an adverse reaction propensity. It is defined as the union of: (a) eHDSIAllergenNoDrug (b) DLP_lecivePripravky (c) DLP_ATC (d) eHDSIAbsentOrUnknownAllergy (e) eHDSIExceptionalValue
